short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upgrade your default New Tab page, Amazing New Tab makes it much nicer! Clean, fast, amazing!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazing New Tab changes your default new Chrome tab to an amazing modern page!
We allow you to customize it with some extra features & functions.

Features & Functions:
 - Inspirational Quotes
 - Google Search Box
 - Time display
 - Nice background images
 - Custom background image
 - Customize font size
 - Favorite Websites


This extension is a revamp of my previous one named: CleanyTab.
The extension will be updated regularly with new features!
